author: .vbuterin
content: But keep in mind that the original SSTORE would cost at least 22100

author: .vbuterin
content: 20000 for the zero -> nonzero, and 2100 for warming up the storage slot

author: sky.cactus
content: It shouldn't be starting at 0 if you overwrite the same slot every time.

author: sky.cactus
content: All you need to do is store an aggregating hash of all transactions.

author: sky.cactus
content: And anytime new transactions come in, you can overwrite the previous one.
